column3:
The dinosaur wants to have a pet goldfish. He is reading a book called, "How to Take Care of Your Pet Goldfish" because he wants to learn how to take care of a goldfish.
ewline
ewlineAfter he finishes reading the book, he goes to the pet store. The pet store is not in Detroit, St. Louis, or Pakistan. The pet store is in a town called Oceanside. It takes the dinosaur an hour to walk to the store. The store is very big, so that the dinosaur can fit inside.
ewline
ewlineA worker from the store walks up to the dinosaur and asks, "How can I help you?"
ewline
ewline"I'm looking to buy a pet goldfish," the dinosaur said.
ewline
ewline"Are you sure?" the worker asked, "We have rainbow fish, red fish, and blue fish. The rainbow fish makes for a great pet."
ewline
ewline"No, thank you," the dinosaur said, "Goldfish are my favorite."
ewline
ewlineAnd so the worker put a goldfish in a bag of water for the dinosaur.
ewline
ewline"Why did you put the goldfish in a bag of water?" the dinosaur asked.
ewline
ewline"Fish always love to have something to swim in," the worker answered, "Enjoy your goldfish!"
ewline
ewlineAnd so the dinosaur walked home, his new best buddy in hand.
column4: multiple: Which fish did the pet store have for sale?
column9: multiple: Why did the worker put the fish in a bag of water?
column11: The worker likes putting fish in bags.
column12: The dinosaur asked for the fish to be put in a bag.
column13: Fish always love to have something to swim in.
column14: multiple: Why is the dinosaur reading his book?
column15: He wants to see if the pet store is big enough for him to fit inside.
column16: He wants to go to Detroit.
column17: He wants to learn how to take care of a goldfish.
column18: He wants to go the pet store.
column19: one: Where is the pet store?
